definition[0]: to be sure that someone or something exists
definition[1]: to think that something is effective or right
example[1]: I don’t believe in these diets.
example[2]: The school believes in letting children learn at their own pace.
definition[2]: to trust someone and be confident that they will be successful
example[3]: The people want a president they can believe in.
example[4]: Believe in yourself, or you’ll never succeed.
